page.title: 06KEN MARRIOT SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: ACROSS THE PASTURELAND FROM THE HOSPITAL LIES THE KEN MARRIOT SPORTS CENTRE AT THE END OF TREVOR WHITE DRIVE.HERE YOU CAN SWIM IN THEIR 33 METRE LONG POOL,WHICH HAS RECENTLY HAD A LONG SLIDE INSTALLED.THIS WAS COMPLETED ON JULY 19 1985.EVERY OTHER SATURDAY YOU CAN JOIN IN AT THEROLLER DISCO.YOU CAN ALSO PLAY SQUASH AND BADMINTON,DO JUDO,TABLE TENNIS AND YOU CAN DO WEIGHT LIFTING TO.WE TRIED TO FIND OUT WHAT THE DAILY INCOME WAS AT THE TURNSTILE BUT THEY WERE NOT INCLINED TO DIVULLDGE THE INFORMATION.TO SUM IT UP IF YOU ARE ANY AGE,IF YOU HAVE ANY DISABILITIES THIS SPORTS CENTRE WILL CATER FOR IT.
